name: Neil Cicierega
description: '''Neil Stephen Cicierega''' ({{IPAc-en|ˌ|s|ɪ|s|ə|ˈ|r|iː|g|ə}} {{Respell|SISS|ə|REE|gə}}; born August 23, 1986) is an American musician, filmmaker, [[YouTuber]], and animator. He is known as the creator of ''[[Potter Puppet Pals]]'', "[[The Ultimate Showdown of Ultimate Destiny]]", and various music albums under the name [[Lemon Demon]], along with a series of [[Mashup (music)|mashup]] albums under his own name.
